name: Octodive
description:
You are an octopus trying to get to the bottom of the oceans.

Use your ink to deflect enemy attacks.

Collect starfish for a boost.

Eat some clams.

And have fun :)

*u*

This game was made during the Ludum dare 48 GameJam. This was my first game created solo. I made everything myself from programming, to art and sound, and all in 48h! I'm really proud of the outcome!
